name: I'm a heavily armored lesbian space mercinary and I really need a girlfriend. (demo2, the procrastinationness)
name_original: I'm a heavily armored lesbian space mercinary and I really need a girlfriend. (demo2, the procrastinationness)
description:
I'm a heavily armored lesbian space mercinary and I really need a girlfriend. (demo2, the procrastinationness) is a game developed by Vorox. It was originally released in 2019.
You can play I'm a heavily armored lesbian space mercinary and I really need a girlfriend. (demo2, the procrastinationness) on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
